content: This is a stupid article. There is no ‘there’ there in his responses. Being evasive is not a conclusion. Criticize them for using the term radical Islamic terrorism. I hate Trump and his cronies but liberals simply cannot help themselves from overreaching and overreacting to everything Trump and his surrogates do. We demolish our own credibility in the process. We do ourselves a disservice when we make hay out of trivial and inconsequential. Focus on really issues.
